attributes.action: Priorotise the homless rather than illegal migrants
attributes.additional_details: By retraining these poor souls that habe fallen through the cracks and providing a safe secure home so that they can open a bank account this wouod be the first steps to bring them back in to society to be both productive and I am sure be grateful for a break in life.
attributes.background:
Help our homeless first before helping illegal migrants.
Provide housing by utilizing old married quarters that are vacant and provide training coarses to enable these people to give them back their dignity and enter society again.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about housing for the homeless, however the allocation of housing for homeless people is a matter for local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/if-youre-homeless-at-risk-of-homelessness

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Abolish the Vagrancy Act 1824
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602247

Provide supermarket vouchers to the homeless so they can have a nutritious meal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591309

Implement reforms to deal with illegal immigration
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601727
